title: An Interview with Major General Jim Hughes

abstract: Jim Hughes talks about his time fighting in Korea, and the long Sunday that changed him.
description: Major General Jim Hughes joined the army just after World War II. Army life suited him and he served as a platoon commander in Korea in the 1950s. He details one particularly long Sunday, during this time, when his company was ambushed by the Chinese and resulted in him maturing considerably in one day.
